trans-unit.source: Provides detailed information about a <see langword="TextFragment" />.
trans-unit.target: Fornece informações detalhadas sobre um <see langword="TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> instances are obtained from the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> on <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> instâncias são obtidas a partir de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> em <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The information in <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> is obtained by parsing the attributes decorating speech text in the Synthesize Speech Markup Language (SSML) used as an input to a synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: As informações no <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> são obtidos com os atributos de decoração de texto de fala no sintetizar fala marcação idioma (SSML) usado como entrada para um mecanismo de síntese de análise.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object can exist for any synthesizer action request as specified by its <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> objeto pode existir para qualquer solicitação de ação do sintetizador conforme especificado pelo seu <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: However, the meaning of its members may change for different actions.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, o significado de seus membros pode alterar para ações diferentes.

trans-unit.source: For more information on synthesize actions, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> for more information about specifying synthesizer actions.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre sintetizar ações, consulte <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> para obter mais informações sobre como especificar ações de sintetizador.

trans-unit.source: Specification and control of the quality of the spoken output is largely handled through the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Prosody%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Duration%2A>
trans-unit.target: Especificação e controle de qualidade de saída de fala em grande parte é tratado por meio de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Prosody%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>, e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Duration%2A>

trans-unit.source: Phonetic, language, and linguist structure information is available through <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.LangId%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A>.
trans-unit.target: As informações de estrutura fonético, linguagem e linguista estão disponíveis por meio de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.LangId%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A>, e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A>.

trans-unit.source: A member of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction" /> enumeration that specifies a speech synthesis action.
trans-unit.target: Um membro da enumeração <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction" /> que especifica uma ação de síntese de fala.

trans-unit.source: The id of the language being used.
trans-unit.target: A ID da linguagem que está sendo usada.

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the XML <c>xml:lang</c> attribute.
trans-unit.target: Corresponde ao atributo <c>xml:lang</c> XML.

trans-unit.source: The emphasis to be applied to speech output or pauses.
trans-unit.target: A ênfase a ser aplicada à saída de fala ou a pausas.

trans-unit.source: The time allotted to speak the text of the <see langword="TextFragment" />.
trans-unit.target: O tempo alocado para falar o texto do <see langword="TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: A member of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs" /> class, indicating the type of text of the <see langword="TextFragment" /> and the level of detail required for accurate rendering of the contained text.
trans-unit.target: Um membro da classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs" />, que indica o tipo de texto do <see langword="TextFragment" /> e o nível de detalhe necessário para a renderização precisa do texto contido.

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the <c><say-as></c> XML tag in the SSML specification
trans-unit.target: Corresponde à marca XML <c><say-as></c> na especificação SSML

trans-unit.source: The argument may be <see langword="null." />
trans-unit.target: O argumento pode ser <see langword="null." />

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody" /> object indicating characteristics of the speech output such as pitch, speaking rate and volume.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody" /> que indica as características da saída de fala como o tom, a velocidade da fala e o volume.

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the <c><prosody></c> XML tag in the SSML specification
trans-unit.target: Corresponde à marca XML <c><prosody></c> na especificação SSML

trans-unit.source: An array of <see langword="char" /> objects providing the phonetic pronunciation for text contained in the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />, using the International Phonetic Alphabet (IPA) specification.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de objetos <see langword="char" /> que fornece a pronúncia fonética do texto contido no <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />, usando a especificação IPA (Alfabeto Fonético Internacional).

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the <c><phoneme></c> XML tag in the SSML specification.
trans-unit.target: Corresponde à marca XML <c><phoneme></c> na especificação SSML.

trans-unit.source: This argument may be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Este argumento pode ser <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new instance of <see langword="FragmentState" />.
trans-unit.target: Constrói uma nova instância de <see langword="FragmentState" />.

trans-unit.source: Typically, applications do not directly construct <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> objects.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, aplicativos não diretamente construir <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Instead, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> instances are created by applications using the members of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis> name space.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> instâncias são criadas por aplicativos usando os membros de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis> espaço de nome.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> value specified by the `action` argument is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Silence>, the value supplied by the `emphasis` argument is either:
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> valor especificado pelo `action` argumento é <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Silence>, o valor fornecido pelo `emphasis` argumento é:

trans-unit.source: If positive, the time in millisecond to pause
trans-unit.target: Em caso positivo, o tempo em milissegundos para pausar

trans-unit.source: If negative a member of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak> enumeration
trans-unit.target: Se negativo um membro do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak> enumeração

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> value specified by the `action` argument is not <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Silence>`emphasis` argument must be of type <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord>.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> valor especificado pelo `action` argumento não é <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Silence> `emphasis` argumento deve ser do tipo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord>.

trans-unit.source: If the value of the `duration` argument and The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody.Duration%2A> property or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody> object specified by the `prosody` argument differ, the value on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody> object is used.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor da `duration` argumento e o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody.Duration%2A> propriedade ou o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody> objeto especificado pelo `prosody` argumento diferentes, o valor a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody> objeto é usado.

trans-unit.source: Returns the requested speech synthesizer action.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a ação de sintetizador de voz solicitada.

trans-unit.source: A member of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction" /> indicating the speech synthesis action requested by SSML input.
trans-unit.target: Um membro de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction" /> indicando que a ação de síntese de fala solicitada pela entrada SSML.

trans-unit.source: Returns the desired time for rendering a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />
trans-unit.target: Retorna a hora desejada para renderizar um <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see langword="int" /> containing a value in millisecond of the desired time for rendering a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <see langword="int" /> que contém um valor em milissegundos do tempo desejado para renderização de um <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns instructions on how to emphasize a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna as instruções sobre como enfatizar um <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see langword="int" /> value indicating how to emphasize a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <see langword="int" /> valor que indica como enfatizar uma <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: The interpretation of the value returned by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> depends on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> value returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property on the current <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>.
trans-unit.target: A interpretação do valor retornado por <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> depende de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> valor retornado pelo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> propriedade atual <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>.

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Silence>
trans-unit.target: Se o valor de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> é <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Silence>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> is positive, the value returned should be interpreted as the length of the silence in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> for positivo, o valor retornado deve ser interpretado como o comprimento de latência em milissegundos.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> is negative, the value returned should be interpreted as a member of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> é negativo, o valor retornado deve ser interpretado como um membro do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak>.

trans-unit.source: Emphasis information returned by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> when the property <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Silence> corresponds to the attributes of the `<break>` element of SSML input to a speech synthesizer engine.
trans-unit.target: Informações de ênfase retornadas por <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> quando a propriedade <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> é <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Silence> corresponde aos atributos do `<break>` elemento de entrada SSML para um mecanismo do sintetizador de voz.

trans-unit.source: For all other values of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A>, the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> values should be interpreted as being of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord>.
trans-unit.target: Para todos os outros valores de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A>, o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> valores devem ser interpretados como sendo do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord>.

trans-unit.source: Emphasis information returned by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> for spoken words corresponds to the attributes of the `<emphasis>` element of SSML input to a speech synthesizer engine.
trans-unit.target: Informações de ênfase retornadas por <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> de palavras faladas corresponde aos atributos do `<emphasis>` elemento de entrada SSML para um mecanismo do sintetizador de voz.

trans-unit.source: Determines if the current instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" /> describes the same <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> state as another <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> instance, or an [Object](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/vstudio/system.object\(v=vs.110\).aspx) which can be cast to <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina se a instância atual do <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" /> descreve o mesmo estado <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> como outra instância <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> ou um [Objeto](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/vstudio/system.object\(v=vs.110\).aspx) que pode ser convertido em <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that can be cast to an instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que pode ser convertido em uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />

trans-unit.source: Determines if a given object is an instance <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" /> equal to the current instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina se um dado objeto é uma instância <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" /> igual à instância atual de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" />, if the current instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> and that obtained from the [Object](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/vstudio/system.object\(v=vs.110\).aspx) provided by the <paramref name="obj" /> argument describe the same <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> state.
trans-unit.target: Retornará <see langword="true" />, se a instância atual de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> e a obtida do [Objeto](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/vstudio/system.object\(v=vs.110\).aspx) fornecido pelo argumento <paramref name="obj" /> descreverem o mesmo estado <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="false" /> if the current <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> and the <paramref name="obj" /> argument do not support the same <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> state.
trans-unit.target: Retornará <see langword="false" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> atual e o argumento <paramref name="obj" /> não derem suporte ao mesmo estado <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: The method return false if the [Object](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/vstudio/system.object\(v=vs.110\).aspx) provided by the `obj` argument cannot be cast to <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: O método retornar false em caso de [objeto](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/vstudio/system.object\(v=vs.110\).aspx) fornecidos pelo `obj` argumento não pode ser convertido em <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> that
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> que

trans-unit.source: Determines if a given instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" /> is equal to the current instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina se uma dada instância de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" /> é igual à instância atual de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" />, if both the current instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> and that supplied through the <paramref name="other" /> argument describe the same <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> state.
trans-unit.target: Retornará <see langword="true" />, se a instância atual de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> e a fornecida por meio do argumento <paramref name="other" /> descreverem o mesmo estado <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="false" /> if the current <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> and the <paramref name="other" /> argument do not support the same <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> state.
trans-unit.target: Retornará <see langword="false" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> atual e o argumento <paramref name="other" /> não derem suporte ao mesmo estado <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o código hash para essa instância.

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer that is the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Um inteiro com sinal de 32 bits que é o código hash para esta instância.

trans-unit.source: Returns the language supported by the current <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a linguagem compatível pelo <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see langword="int" /> containing an identifier for the language used by the current <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <see langword="int" /> que contém um identificador para o idioma usado pelo atual <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" />.

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.LangId%2A> are those used with the Windows Speech API (SAPI) and are generated from the "`xml:lang`" attribute on SSML input to a speech synthesizer engine.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.LangId%2A> são usados com a API de fala do Windows (SAPI) e são gerados a partir de "`xml:lang`" atributo na entrada SSML para um mecanismo do sintetizador de voz.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> whose described state is compared against the instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> provided by the <c>state2</c> argument.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> cujo estado descrito é comparado com a instância do <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> fornecida pelo argumento <c>state2</c>.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> whose described state is compared against the instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> provided by the <c>state1</c> argument.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> cujo estado descrito é comparado com a instância do <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> fornecida pelo argumento <c>state1</c>.

trans-unit.source: Determines if two instances of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" /> describes the same <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> state.
trans-unit.target: Determina se duas instâncias de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" /> descrevem o mesmo estado <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if both instances of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" />, <paramref name="state1" /> and <paramref name="state2" />, describe the same <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> state, otherwise <see langword="false" /> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Retornará <see langword="true" /> se as instâncias de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" />, <paramref name="state1" /> e <paramref name="state2" /> descreverem o mesmo estado <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />, caso contrário será retornado <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Equals%28System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: O método equivalente para esse operador é <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Equals%28System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> whose described state is compared against the instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> provided by the <c>state2</c> argument.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> cujo estado descrito é comparado com a instância do <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> fornecida pelo argumento <c>state2</c>.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> whose described state is compared against the instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> provided by the <c>state1</c> argument.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> cujo estado descrito é comparado com a instância do <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> fornecida pelo argumento <c>state1</c>.

trans-unit.source: Determines if two instances of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" /> describes the different <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> state.
trans-unit.target: Determina se duas instâncias de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" /> descrevem o estado <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> diferente.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if both instances of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" />, <paramref name="state1" /> and <paramref name="state2" />, do not describe the same <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> state, otherwise <see langword="false" /> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Retornará <see langword="true" /> se as instâncias de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" />, <paramref name="state1" /> e <paramref name="state2" /> não descreverem o mesmo estado <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />, caso contrário será retornado <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Equals%28System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: O método equivalente para esse operador é <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Equals%28System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Returns phonetic information for a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />
trans-unit.target: Retorna informações fonéticas para um <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />

trans-unit.source: The information returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A> property corresponds to the `<phoneme>` XML tag of SSML input to a synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: As informações retornadas pelo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A> propriedade corresponde do `<phoneme>` marca XML de entrada SSML para um mecanismo de síntese.

trans-unit.source: The array of `char` objects returned by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A> property expresses pronunciation using the International Phonetic Alphabet (IPA).
trans-unit.target: A matriz de `char` objetos retornados pelo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A> propriedade expressa pronúncia usando alfabeto fonético de internacional (IPA).

trans-unit.source: Returns detailed information about the pitch, speaking rate, and volume of speech output.
trans-unit.target: Retorna informações detalhadas sobre o tom, a velocidade da fala e o volume da saída de fala.

trans-unit.source: Returns a valid instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody" /> containing the pitch, speaking rate, and volume settings, and changes to those setting, for speech output.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma instância válida de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody" /> que contém o tom falando taxa e as configurações de volume e alterações para essas configurações para a saída de fala.

trans-unit.source: The information returned by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody> corresponds to the `<prosody>` XML tag in the SSML specification
trans-unit.target: As informações retornadas por <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody> corresponde do `<prosody>` marca XML na especificação SSML

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the context for the generation of speech from text..
trans-unit.target: Retorna informações sobre o contexto para a geração de fala com base no texto.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs" /> instance if the SSML used by a speech synthesis engine contains detailed information about the context to be used to generate speech, otherwise <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs" /> instância se o SSML usado pelo mecanismo de síntese de fala contém informações detalhadas sobre o contexto a ser usado para gerar a voz, caso contrário, <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The information returned by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A> corresponds to the `<say-as>` tag and its attributes in the SSML specification, and can specify:
trans-unit.target: As informações retornadas por <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A> corresponde do `<say-as>` marca e seus atributos na especificação SSML e pode especificam:

trans-unit.source: The content type (such as currency, date, or address) or language construct represented by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> property of a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de conteúdo (como moeda, data ou endereços) ou construção de linguagem representado por <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> propriedade de um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.

trans-unit.source: Optional formatting information to handle the content type represented by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> property of a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, for example, a date syntax.
trans-unit.target: Opcional informações de formatação para lidar com o tipo de conteúdo representado por <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> propriedade de um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, por exemplo, uma sintaxe de data.

trans-unit.source: The detail to be used in generating speech from the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> property of a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, for example, whether to explicitly render punctuation.
trans-unit.target: Os detalhes a ser usado na geração da fala a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> propriedade de um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, por exemplo, se deve processar explicitamente pontuação.
